Заголовок 2: An application that will help you find a friend, a girlfriend, a like-minded person, and maybe a soulmate...
Результат приложения: What is the result of our application?
Текст результата 1: Voenmeh is a university with a huge number of students, where everyone can find their own person. However, it is difficult to do this in such a mass of people.
Текст результата 2: The application “Voenmeh. Dating app” is focused on the optimal and accurate search for new acquaintances!
Текст миссии 1: To introduce people with similar interests. This is effective when a person knows who he is getting to know.
Текст миссии 2: During the development process, we try to cover a large number of hobbies and hobbies, because everyone needs their own person!
Текст интернационализации 1: We understand that not only Russian-speaking citizens study at Voenmeh. Our team has worked on this point, so the application “Voenmeh. Dating app” is available both in Russian, so it is in English!
Текст пора пробовать 1: You can sit still and do nothing for a long time, but you always need to try. Join the community of people interested in getting to know each other and find the person you want!
Ключевое приложение: Key application in the public sphere
Текст ключевое приложение: We are interested in everyone finding their place in society. Nowadays, words of support and having the right person next to you already gives you a sense of confidence in yourself and your abilities
